Course Description: AN INTRODUCTION TO AND OVERVIEW OF AUDITING CONCEPTS AND TECHNIQUES.   EMPHASIS IS PLACED ON CONCEPTS AND TECHNIQUES APPLICABLE TO THE INTEGRATED AUDITS OF FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND INTERNAL CONTROLS OVER FINANCIAL REPORTING PERFORMED BY INDEPENDENT CERTIFIED PUBLIC ACCOUNTANTS.
Textbook(s): AUDITING AND ASSURANCE SERVICES: A SYSTEMATIC APPROACH, MESSIER, GLOVER, AND PRAWITT, 4TH ED.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
